TopicTitle: FPS drop if BattleNet launcher is running

Articles.Content:
Er, so yeah, problem's in the title. Or not really even a problem, but an observation that I can reliably repeat and might be affecting other people as well as myself. I'm not sure if this is anything that Squad is/should be responsible for, just wanted to make you folks aware in case other people discover it to be their issue as well 

Problem manifests even with the BNet launcher minimised to system tray. The BNet launcher is not hogging system resources, but with it active, KSP seems to cap itself to 16 fps and my GPU and CPU usage drop to around 30%.

Obvious fix is obvious... completely close BNet launcher.

 

Win 7 x64, Intel i5, 32 gb memory, nVidia 760, Soundblaster Z, SSD.
